title: How One Guy’s Car Blog Became a $1 Billion Marketplace
excerpt: It’s a place for obsessives to buy, sell and geek out over classic cars. The company pops open its hood after 100,000 auctions to explain why.

title: The Wild, Wonderful World of Estate Sales
excerpt: The estate-sale industry is fragile and persistent in a way that doesn’t square with the story of the world as we have come to expect it.

title: Auction Catalogue Symbols, Decoded
excerpt: Collectors fluent in catalogue symbology can see which lots are locked in, which might lead to surprising results, and how an entire auction is likely to go.

title: Auction Prices That Take Your Breath Away
excerpt: Prices for works by some relatively new artists have skyrocketed, seemingly overnight.
